Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Madanis in L'Hospitalet de Llobregat, you'll be connected to the airport and minutes from Camp Nou and close to Casa Batllo. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of FC Barcelona Museum and La Masia.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 30 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Your room comes with a memory foam bed. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as bicycles to rent, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in L'Hospitalet de Llobregat? This hotel has facilities measuring 247.56 square feet (23 square meters), including a meeting room.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Hotel Madanis in L'Hospitalet de Llobregat, you'll be connected to the airport and minutes from Camp Nou and close to Casa Batllo. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of FC Barcelona Museum and La Masia.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Camp Nou - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
FC Barcelona Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
La Masia - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Polytechnic University of Catalonia - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Ceramics Museum - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Barcelona Textile and Clothing Museum - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Hospital Universitari Quiron Dexeus - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Catalonia Palace of Congresses - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Guell Pavellons - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Park of Industrial Spain - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Lâ€™Illa Diagonal Mall - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Corachan Clinic - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Monestir de Pedralbes - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Joan Miro Park - 2.3 km / 1.5 mi
Fira Barcelona - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Madanis is Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.) - 8.9 km / 5.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
